official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide for prompt payment of basic pay payable to Federal employees.

summary.text: Requires each executive agency to pay basic pay to each employee not later than 30 days after the end of the period for which the pay is payable. Requires each agency to pay interest on any amount of basic pay not paid by the end of such 30 days.
